ol.li: Ensure that all rolling stock is inspected and certified in accordance with local legislative requirements.
Undertake pre-operation inspections to check condition before operating. Remove from service if damaged or malfunctioning.

Undertake periodic inspections, testing, and maintenance of rolling stock to maintain the highest standards of operation. Inspections shall include structural and mechanical elements and refer to relevant standards for guidance.
All maintenance shall be performed to the manufacturer’s specifications.
Equipment shall not be used to exceed manufacturer’s performance, such as overloading capacity of the equipment to move or stop.
Do not disable any safety devices (such as horns, bells, etc.) on the equipment.
